sql: SELECT ROUND(AVG(OrderDetails.Quantity * Products.Price), 2) AS AverageOrderValue FROM Orders JOIN "Order Details" ON Orders.OrderID = OrderDetails.OrderID JOIN Products ON OrderDetails.ProductID = Products.ProductID WHERE 'Winter Classics' IN (Orders.DateColumn)

sql:
SELECT p.ProductName, SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - COALESCE(od.Discount, 0))) AS TotalRevenue 
           FROM "Order Details" od 
           JOIN Products p ON od.ProductID = p.ProductID 
           GROUP BY p.ProductName 
           ORDER BY TotalRevenue DESC 
           LIMIT 3;
explanation: Generated SQL used Order Details, Products; Answer derived and coerced to requested format.

sql: SELECT ROUND(SUM(od.Quantity * p.Price), 2) AS TotalRevenue FROM "Order Details" od JOIN Products p ON od.ProductID = p.ProductID JOIN Orders o ON od.OrderID = o.OrderID JOIN Customers c ON o.CustomerID = c.CustomerID WHERE p.CategoryName = 'Beverages' AND strftAFTER(o.OrderDate, '1997-06-01') <= '1997-08-31';
explanation: Generated SQL used Orders, Order Details, Products, Customers; Answer derived and coerced to requested format.
